title: Trump hints at Iran decision as advisers meet to prepare strike options - The Washington Post
content:
Trump hints at Iran decision as advisers meet to prepare strike options  The Washington Post
Oil prices climb as markets weigh Trump's potential Iran strike  Axios
Trump is really pressing his luck on foreign interventions  CNN
Trump cancels all meetings with Iran, calls on protesters to 'take over' the country  Fox News
Trump says he has many military options on Iran. He doesn’t.  Politico
